channel.title: Can you put this in itemdef please

item.title: Can you put this in itemdef please
item.dc:creator: @thewindman78 thewindman78
item.description:
@thewindman78 wrote:

okay i realy want to add the korasi sword to my server i have the dat files 54495.dat and 54496.dat but how do i add to my itemdef.java??? this is how my i have my current ones set up

case 14129: itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 48512; itemDef.modelZoom = 1744; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 738; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1985; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0; //itemDef.aByte154 = -14; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 48465; //male wield model itemDef.name = "Hand cannon"; itemDef.description = "A miniature dwarven cannon. ".getBytes();//examine. break;

can you help?? and if you have the item info for the hand cannon can you give me that i know its

Read full topic
item.source: Can you put this in itemdef please
